snippet.title: Tough Trucks : Modified Monsters Demonstration
snippet.description:
Demonstration of Tough Trucks - the virtually unknown predecessor to Flatout. Its pretty much Ivan Stewarts Super Offroad in full glorious 3D, and any fans of that game will feel right at home.

Visit MGV for more videos - http://sonic.animebots.co.uk/MGV/
